Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Board

Class BoardValidator

java.lang.Object
com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Board.BoardValidator
public class BoardValidator extends Object
Utility class for validating ship placements and board operations. Provides static methods for validation logic.

      public BoardValidator()

  • Method Details

    • isValidPlacement

      public static boolean isValidPlacement(IBoard board, IShip ship)
      Validates if a ship can be placed on the board. Checks that the ship is not null, has a start coordinate, is within bounds, and does not overlap with existing ships.
      Parameters:
      board - The board to validate against
      ship - The ship to validate
      Returns:
      true if the placement is valid, false otherwise

    • isWithinBounds

      public static boolean isWithinBounds(IBoard board, Coordinate coordinate)
      Checks if a coordinate is within the board bounds.
      Parameters:
      board - The board to check against
      coordinate - The coordinate to validate
      Returns:
      true if the coordinate is within bounds, false otherwise

    • hasNoOverlap

      public static boolean hasNoOverlap(IBoard board, IShip ship)
      Checks if a ship placement would overlap with existing ships.
      Parameters:
      board - The board to check against
      ship - The ship to check
      Returns:
      true if there is no overlap, false if overlap exists
